Class Layer3Switch

java.lang.Object
Devices.Device
Devices.Switch
Devices.Layer3Switch
All Implemented Interfaces:
DeviceWithCLI
public class Layer3Switch extends Switch implements DeviceWithCLI
Represents a Layer 3 Switch capable of both switching and basic routing. Supports VLAN configuration and IP helper setup for DHCP relay functions.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Izzy Kavanagh
